titleStmt.title: The blind-beggar of Bednal-green vvith the merry humor of Tom Strowd the Norfolk yeoman, as it was divers times publickly acted by the Princes Servants / written by John Day.
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1574-1640?
Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Pollard, and Tho. Dring ...,

notesStmt.note: Written in 1600 in collaboration with Henry Chettle.--Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
